summary: The customer was having trouble with their Contoso Wireless bill and the agent was able to help by explaining why the price had increased and informing the customer of the various discounts and promotional offers available. The agent offered a discounted rate on the Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G phone, free shipping, an additional 10% off any accessories or services associated with the phone, and a discounted rate on their monthly bill if they sign up for a two-year contract. The customer was interested in taking advantage of these offers and the agent was able to get them started right away.
